content: I thought this app may be perfect place to meet others who have kids just like myself.But 2 weeks on the app and the disappointment is there! If you are not paying member you get limited number of swipes only. People can be living as far as 200 miles away so once you swiped all those living too far you are out of your swiping allowances.
